info.full_description: Welcome to staging.Moth.social, the companion server to Mammoth, a beautiful Mastodon app for the iPhone. Pls read our Content Policies.
info.short_description: Welcome to staging.Moth.social. Our mission is to make Mastodon fun & user friendly for everyone. We also build Mammoth for iPhone, iPad & Mac --the easiest way to Mastodon.
